data.title: North Alabama Waterpark
data.meta_description: Experience the best waterpark in North Alabama at WildWater. 22,000 sq.ft. Wave Pool, 10 Thrill Rides, Kid's Splash Area, Drift River, and more. Buy Tickets, plan your 2024 Season, and make reservations. Don't miss out on the ultimate summer adventure!
data.text:
NOW OPEN WEEKENDS!

2024 CALENDAR

We are NOW OPEN Weekends!

*Operating Dates & Hours are subject to change.

We can't wait to see you!

Let's Splash!

WildWater is North Alabama's newest water park - featuring a 22,000 sq.ft. Wave Pool, 10 Thrill Rides for the adventure seekers, a Kid's Splash Area with 8 slides, a Drift River for those looking to relax, and the best in food & beverage options around. Enjoy a meal from The Oasis for lunch, grab a quick snack at The Gully, and then finish the day with a frozen treat from Iceberg.

Reservations

Maximize your fun and relaxation at WildWater with a private Cabana rental! WildWater also offer Group Rates and Pavilion Rentals for those looking to celebrate their birthday or group outing at WildWater.

Things To Do

Whether you are a thrill-seeker or are looking to relax on the Drift River, WildWater has something for everyone! Click to learn more about our slides, wave pool, kid's area, and concessions.

Hours & Info

DIVE IN MOVIE SEASON IS HERE

Our favorite summer adventure! There is so much to do. Great food and refreshments. We love WildWater!!

- Katie K.

WILDWATER is our favorite waterpark in AL! It is clean! It is big but not so big that I lose sight of my child! We love this place!!

- Angela L.

My girls love WildWater! It is their favorite place to go. Fantastic slides, an awesome wave pool, super clean, and safe.

- Devin E.
